00050 std::string SmartLaplacianSmoother::get_name() const
00051   { return "SmartLaplacianSmoother"; }
00052 
00053 SmartLaplacianSmoother::SmartLaplacianSmoother(ObjectiveFunction* obj_func,
00054                                                MsqError &err) 
00055   : LaplacianCommon( obj_func ? obj_func : 
00056                     (defaultObjFunc = new LInfTemplate(
00057                      (edgeQM = new IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio(err))))) 
00058 {
00059   if (obj_func) {
00060     edgeQM = 0;
00061     defaultObjFunc = 0;
00062   }
00063 }  
00064 
00065 SmartLaplacianSmoother::~SmartLaplacianSmoother() 
00066 {
00067   delete edgeQM;
00068   delete defaultObjFunc;
00069 }

00081 
00087 void SmartLaplacianSmoother::optimize_vertex_positions(PatchData &pd, 
00088                                                 MsqError &err)
00089 {
00090     //default the laplacian smoother to 3 even for 2-d elements.
00091     //int dim = get_mesh_set()->space_dim();
00092   size_t dim = 3;
00093   MsqVertex* verts=pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00094     //the objective function evaluator
00095   OFEvaluator& obj_func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00096     //variables for the function values.
00097   double orig_val=0;
00098   double mod_val=0;
00099     //compute the original function value and check validity
00100   bool valid_flag = obj_func.evaluate(pd,orig_val,err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00101   // does the Laplacian smoothing
00102   MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator free_iter(pd, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00103   free_iter.reset();
00104   free_iter.next();
00105     //m is the free vertex.
00106   size_t m=free_iter.value();
00107   vector<size_t> vert_indices;
00108   vert_indices.reserve(25);
00109     //get vertices adjacent to vertex m
00110   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices(m,vert_indices,err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00111     //move vertex m
00112     //save the original position of the free vertex
00113   Vector3D orig_position(verts[m]);
00114     //smooth the patch
00115   centroid_smooth_mesh(pd, vert_indices.size(), vert_indices,
00116                        m, dim, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00117     //snap vertex m to domain
00118   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain(m,err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00119     //if the original function val was invalid, then we allow the move
00120     //But, if it wasn valid, we need to decide.
00121   if(valid_flag){
00122       //compute the new value
00123     valid_flag = obj_func.evaluate(pd,mod_val,err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00124       //if the new value is worse the original OR if the new value is not
00125       //valid (we already know the original value was valid by above) then
00126       //we don't allow the move.
00127     if(!valid_flag || mod_val>orig_val){
00128         //move the vert back to where it was.
00129       verts[m]=orig_position;
00130         //PRINT_INFO("\norig = %f, new = %f, new valid = %d",orig_val,mod_val,valid_flag);
00131     }
00132     
00133   }
00134   
00135 }
